sn34.12:1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco jhayi samadhismim samapattikusalo hoti, na samadhismim vutthanakusalo.
sn34.12:1.5: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhayi samadhismim vutthanakusalo hoti, na samadhismim samapattikusalo.
sn34.12:1.6: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhayi neva samadhismim samapattikusalo hoti, na ca samadhismim vutthanakusalo.
sn34.12:1.7: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhayi samadhismim samapattikusalo ca hoti, samadhismim vutthanakusalo ca.
